references.paper_title: Depth Prompting for Sensor-Agnostic Depth Estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces the core concept of sensor-agnostic depth completion, a key problem addressed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Vision meets robotics: The KITTI dataset
references.reason: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark dataset frequently used in depth completion research, providing a standard for evaluating model performance.

references.paper_title: Indoor segmentation and support inference from RGBD images
references.reason: The NYU dataset, introduced in this paper, is another benchmark dataset commonly used for evaluating the performance of depth completion models.
This paper introduces efficient methods for stereo matching which are foundational to depth completion techniques.

references.paper_title: Depth estimation via affinity learned with convolutional spatial propagation network
references.reason: This paper introduces Convolutional Spatial Propagation Networks (CSPNs), a key component of many state-of-the-art depth completion methods.
